categories: Category:Star Wars: Episode I Adventures Game Books

nodes.text: Episode I Adventures Game Book 11: Pirates from Beyond the Sea
Episode I Adventures Game Book 11: Pirates from Beyond the Sea was the eleventh installment of Star Wars Episode I Adventures game books.

Space pirates have attacked the Gungans' sacred place, hijacking ancient statues and threatening to sell them to the highest bidder. You are the only Gungan who can save these treasures—and defeat the invaders.
Move quickly. Time is running out.
